Judul: STUDENTS IN BANDUNG FOR YOGURT CONSUMPTION FINAL PROJECT
Abstrak:
Abstract:  
 
 

Conducting this final assignment is the requirement that should be done by writer in order to graduate from Undergraduate Program School of Business and management Institut Teknologi Bandung. In this assignment, writer discusses about one matter related to the yoghurt Producers in Ciwidey. The main problem talked in this assignment is the obstacles that those producers face in widening their product (yoghurt) market to north Bandung. Besides mentioning that main problem, writer also tries to find some solutions for those producers in order to give them access of finding the way out of their problem. Solutions given in this assignment based on the research result that was previously conducted through 300 respondents.
